Posts.Content: Mar 26, 2010 06:58PM lexmom wrote: Hello Ladies-I am right here with you. I am scheduled for a bilat. mastectomy with immediate diep flap reconstruction 4/12/10. I am anxious to get it done, but also nervous and overwhelmed with all the details and plans. But for the most part I am just glad to be knowing that these diseased parts will be gone and I will be moving forward with my best chances! But it is nice to have this sisterhood of support as well!
